scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.join('node_modules', 'kuromoji', 'dict'); const dest = 'dict'; if (fs.existsSync(src)) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest); fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true}); console.log('Kamus disalin ke ./dict'); }"
